title: Мастер игры
overview: According to the rules of the show, 22 participants gather together in a luxurious villa, where they will have to undergo tests and conduct a hidden struggle. Three players from the very beginning become "dark" - their task is to hide their role, eliminate rivals and manipulate the rest. The rest are "light", their goal is to identify traitors and save the team. However, during the game, anyone can join the "dark".
